hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ali (may Allah be pleased with him) said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) set a time limit of three days and three nights for the traveler, and one day and one night for the resident - meaning, with regards to wiping (over the Khuffs)

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّوْقِيتِ فِي الْمَسْحِ عَلَى الْخُفَّيْنِ لِلْمُقِيمِ
chapter.eng-name: Time Limit For Wiping Over The Khuffs For The Resident
